name: Digitally Imported & RadioTunes compact favorites
description: compacts the channels on the manage favorites page on Digitally Imported and RadioTunes, so you can see them all at once

additional_info: changelog: 2020-02-12: update for website code changes 2018-07-30: apply to RadioTunes, too 2016-08-16: fix width of items to not change while dragging to avoid things jumping around 2016-08-08: update for some DI website code changes, style 'available channels' section to match 'my favorites', decrease padding on sides of page for more use of screen real estate 2015-05-05: apply to http (unsecure) page, too
